documents.description: On December 4th, 2018 Environmental Assessment Office (EAO) Compliance and Enforcement Officers Justin Carlson and Shayla Frechette (collectively EAO C&E) conducted a field and administrative inspection on the Project (EAC# E15-01) located near Kitimat, BC.
documents.name: Compliance
documents.author: EAO

documents.description: On 2015-11-02, EAO C&E conducted an inspection of the LNG Canada (LNGC) Project site near Kitimat. LNGC informed EAO C&E September 14, 2015 that they may proceed to construction Mid October 2015 (as per Appendix B Condition 1).
documents.name: Compliance
documents.author: EAO
